channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ University of Southampton on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Rethinking Deep Thinking: Stable Learning of Algorithms using Lipschitz Constraints
item.description: Stable algorithm learning achieved by Deep Thinking networks with Lipschitz Constraints, ensuring convergence and better extrapolation to complex problems.

item.title: Speaking Your Language: Spatial Relationships in Interpretable Emergent Communication
item.description: AI agents developed a communication system using spatial relationships, achieving over 90% accuracy in conveying relative positions of objects within a scene.

item.title: Variational Delayed Policy Optimization
item.description: VDPO: A novel framework for delayed reinforcement learning achieving 50% sample efficiency improvement without compromising performance.
